actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Williamsport-Lycoming County Chamber of Commerce of Williamsport, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Allows a chamber of commerce in Pennsylvania, certain Federal inspection and certification requirements notwithstanding, to operate a named vessel upon a segment of the Susquehanna River, provided all State inspection and certification requirements are met.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Williamsport-Lycoming County Chamber of Commerce of Williamsport, Pennsylvania.
